meanings.definition: Moving or facing toward the east.
meanings.sent1: The sun rises in the eastbound sky every morning.
meanings.sent2: The eastbound train departed promptly at 8 AM.
meanings.sent3: The eastbound birds greeted the day with their cheerful chirping.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams always led her on an eastbound journey towards new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The eastbound wind carried the scent of fresh flowers from the garden.

meanings.sent1: She drove eastbound on the highway to reach her destination.
meanings.sent2: The marathon runners raced eastbound towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel scampered eastbound across the yard, chasing after a nut.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move eastbound, rushing towards the future.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed eastbound, reflecting the colors of the setting sun.
